We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: 2D Graphics Designer

Job Location:&nbsp;Gbagada, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview


	We are seeking a talented and detail-oriented 2D Graphic Artist to join our creative team at our Gbagada office.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for producing visually compelling designs, animations, and graphics that effectively communicate our brand&rsquo;s message and support various marketing, product, and corporate initiatives.


Key Responsibilities


	Conceptualize, design, and produce high-quality 2D graphics, illustrations, and animations.
	Develop creative content for marketing campaigns, product presentations, and digital platforms.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate project requirements into effective visual designs.
	Prepare design storyboards, models, and drafts to present creative concepts.
	Ensure consistency and alignment with brand guidelines across all visual materials.
	Keep abreast of emerging design trends, tools, and technologies relevant to 2D graphics and animation.


Qualifications &amp; Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Fine Arts, Graphic Design, Multimedia Arts, or a related discipline (or equivalent experience).
	2 years of proven experience in 2D/3D design, animation, and motion graphics with a strong portfolio.
	Proficiency in design and animation software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects), Blender, Maya, or Cinema4D.
	Strong understanding of design principles, composition, and visual storytelling.
	Excellent attention to detail, time management, and communication skills.
	Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.


Method of Application&nbsp;

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "General Manager",
  "description": "Hazon Holdings is a continually growing and leading conglomerate domiciled in Africa. We specialize in raising standards through our synergy of diverse business units. We are core believers in driving people, processes and businesses to attain peak productivity in given fields through steadfastness and ultimate discipline.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: General Manager
Job Location:&nbsp;Gbagada, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Overview


	The General Manager will oversee the agency&rsquo;s day-to-day operations and lead strategic planning to drive growth, efficiency, and client satisfaction.
	This role combines operational leadership with a strong focus on business strategy, team performance, and profitability.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee daily agency operations, ensuring smooth workflow across departments.
	Develop and implement strategic plans to achieve business goals and growth targets.
	Lead performance reviews, KPIs, and process improvements.
	Collaborate with department heads (strategy, creative, operations etc.) to ensure alignment with agency objectives.
	Support client relationship management and new business initiatives.
	Monitor market trends and identify new opportunities for expansion or optimization.
	Foster a high-performance culture that emphasizes accountability, collaboration, and innovation.


Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Business, Marketing, or related field
	6+ years of experience in marketing, advertising, or agency operations
	Proven leadership and strategic planning experience.
	Strong analytical, communication, and organizational skills.

Drilling Engineer / Specialist III Job at Habrams Energy




        
    

        
        Habrams Energy offers you engineering, procurement, construction management, operations, and maintenance services for oil & gas projects in the Gulf of Guinea. We provide specialist solutions to international oil companies, marginal field operators, and service companies.

Our work ranges from retrofitting and de-bottlenecking to designing complete facilities with seamless transition from construction to operations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Drilling Engineer / Specialist III

Job Location: Lagos

Main Functions
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Provide the engineering planning, design, surveillance, and follow-up required for the safe and efficient drilling and completing of drilling programs.
	Ensure well objectives are met while assuring the highest standards of engineering integrity, safety, and environmental protection are applied.
	Provide technical expertise on drilling engineering to the Operations and Development teams.


Tasks and Responsibilities
In addition to all Level 1 and 2 tasks, a Level 3 will:


	Prepare Drilling Basis of Design documentation including Casing Design, Torque / Drag, Hydraulics
	Develop functional specifications and scopes of work for equipment and services
	Make continuous effort to improve regional well construction performance


Skills and Qualifications


	B.Sc Degree in Engineering or related technical field
	Experience with well planning and execution
	Experience with international assignments required
	Experience in deep water drilling operations if filling a deep water drilling engineering position
	Able to effectively organize and communicate thoughts
	Experience with well design software as well as Microsoft applications
	Read, write and speak fluent English
	Industry experience with well planning and execution.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications to: hesprojectrecruitment@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
